thread.title: Britney Spears Accidentally Exposed Her Nipple on Stage [NSFW]
thread.title_full: Britney Spears Accidentally Exposed Her Nipple on Stage [NSFW]

author: Rachel Torgerson
title: Britney Spears Accidentally Exposed Her Nipple on Stage [NSFW]
text:
Britney Spears Accidentally Exposed Her Nipple on Stage [NSFW] 
#FreeTheNipple. Twitter Advertisement - Continue Reading Below During an on-stage performance of "Work, Bitch" at her Las Vegas residency on Monday night, Britney Spears's lacy teal bodysuit slipped out of place and exposed her left breast. Of course, this was caught on video. Of course, Brit powered through the wardrobe malfunction like a champ. She kept singing and dancing with her one boob hanging out and looked damn good doing it. You can see it all happen in these very ~NSFW~ fan clips and pics, which were posted to Twitter directly from the audience. Britney's tit in HQ pic.twitter.com/uEwv1foRaI One photo makes it look like the problem originated when the left side of her costume got caught on one of her backup dancers. BRITNEY SPEARS HAS A NIP SLIP ON STAGE pic.twitter.com/y2ZUUaJhUs — ㅤㅤㅤ (@godneybjs) February 2, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below This isn't the first time Britney's suffered problems with her costumes while performing. Just a few months ago, she went through a similar situation with a bondage-inspired bra. Though, that time, she was able to catch the issue in time and was eventually covered by a jacket. Can someone please get Britney some extra-strong fashion tape? Get non-boring fashion and beauty news directly in your feed. Follow Facebook.com/CosmoBeauty . Follow Rachel on Twitter and Instagram .
